editorChoice.name: District of Luxury

content.sgt: If you're willing to spend some money, then check out this place. This will be youre assembly point.
content.formal: Bundang line passes the subway station located at Apgujeong-ro Gangnamgu, Seoul.

content.sgt: Apgugeong Rodeo street was a plyaground for young and rich since late 80s. There are still lots of pubs and clothing stores.
content.formal: It is a street of fashion and culture for young people in Apgujeong, a typical downtown area.

content.sgt: Can I see what you got there in your wallet? You're thinking of going to Galleria department store with only that? You should just enjoy it with your eyes.
content.formal: It is a department store of Hanhwa Group located in Apgujeong-dong Gangnamgu in Seoul. There are lots of luxury brands as it's located in Apgujeong, known as a typical downtown area.

content.sgt: You should be thankful for not letting you spend some money at the Galleria. In this place, world-class boutique shops are waiting for you.
content.formal: The street where flag-stores of high-end brands around the world are gathered.

content.sgt: These kinds of shopping may not suit real soldiers, so let's take a break from the march for shopping.
content.formal: It's a nice gallery/Italian restaurant located in Cheongdam-dong, a typical downtown area.

content.sgt: Wanna be Gatsby tonight? Then we recommend you this place.
content.formal: A street full of bars and lounges where you can enjoy luxurious parties.

editorChoice.description: Hey soldier! How's your saving account doing so far? You can enjoy luxury life in Korea too. Make sure to have a fat wallet with you.

editorChoice.name: Small City, Big History

content.sgt: This the assembly point of this travel. Are y'all ready?
content.formal: A train station arriving to Jeonju. This is where every Jeonju trips begin.

places.name: Deokjin park

content.sgt: The first start is a park where many have come to relax from the old days. It feels very oriental.
content.formal: An oriental park filled with lotus flowers next to a beautiful lake.

places.address: 390 Gwon samdeuk-ro, Deokjindong 1(il)-ga, Deokjin-gu, Jeonju, Jeollabuk-do

content.sgt: There was a country called Joseon of Old Korea. The kings built temples and used to have annual ceremonies.
content.formal: Jeonju, the spiritual home of the Joseon Dynasty, has a temple honoring the kings of the Joseon Dynasty.

content.sgt: Built in 1908-1914, this historic Romanesque church features statues of Korean Catholic martyrs.
content.formal: The oldest and the first Romanesque chuch in Jeonju. It's a place for historic martyrs.

content.sgt: Cultural village with traditional Korean building, Japanese houses, calligraphy, and sake museums.
content.formal: It's a village composed of Hanoks. Here, you can look into the life of old Korea, rent hanbok, wear hanbok, and roam the streets.

content.sgt: The real charm of the trip is walking around the local market and enjoying a variety of things to see and eat.
content.formal: A fun place to see a variety of food and local merchants. Jeonju is a traditional market area.

content.sgt: It's a good place to relax in a cafe on the street in a town decorated with colorful houses.
content.formal: A town that has a lot to see such as colorful wall paintings and a resting area like cafes.

editorChoice.description: Shall we go to Jeonju where all the Korean histories are gathered? Feel the unique vibe of Far East.

editorChoice.name: Beautiful Scenes of Southern Coast

content.sgt: It's the assembly point of this trip. Are y'all ready?
content.formal: A bus terminal in Yeosu.

content.sgt: I'm assuming you've all heard of Admiral Yi? He's one of world three heros of naval battles. Feel his energy in square honoring his achievements.
content.formal: A square built to honor the Korean hero, General Yi Sun-sin. There is a turtle ship which is the first armored ship in the world and you can also board on it.

content.sgt: Enjoy the scenery on the cable car passing through Yeosu 's southern coast. Don't tell me you have ? AIRBORNE!
content.formal: It is a marine cable car that connects the island to the land via Yeosu Sea. You can enjoy the view of Yeosu's Arum, passing over the sea.

content.sgt: It's an island famous for its beauty from the past, and there's also a bamboo forest so you can enjoy the oriental scenery.
content.formal: From a distance, the shape of the island is like a paulownia leaf, and there's a lot of paulownia ever since it's called Ohdongdo. Famous for its camellia flowers and bamboo forests, you can enjoy the scenery of Yeosu sea, which is seen from the forest.

content.sgt: Have y'all heard of Hendrick Harmel? This lighthouse was named after him. He would be proud of it in heaven.
content.formal: It's an unmanned lighthouse named after the Dutchman Hendrik Hamel who first introduced Korea to Europe. It's located in Hamel waterside park.

content.sgt: This small Buddhist temple on a forested coastal cliff features a terrace with dramatic ocean views. Enjoy.
content.formal: It's a temple founded by the monk Won Hyo of the Silla Dynasty. It's surrounded by the rocky cliffs of Geumo Mountain, between camellias and subtropical plants. It's also the base of the monk who fought for Yi Sun-sin during the Imjin War. You can see the camellia forest road on the way to the Hyang-il-am, and the beautiful Namhae sea on the hill.

editorChoice.description: Do you like sea? What if that sea is the one that commemorates admiral who controled the historical battle? Let's go and see how the naval warfare was like at that time.

editorChoice.name: Biggest and Rising

content.sgt: This is not only the assembly point for you guys, but also for Korean young people. Don't be surprised by so many people.
content.formal: The famous street of youth in Seoul. It's the background of Psy's Gangnam Style and is famous for fashion, club, restaurant, and pub.

content.sgt: Massive underground shopping mall & convention center with a theater, auqariam & restaurants. It once was the biggest mall in Asia!
content.formal: Largest undergroung shopping center in Asia, located in Samseong-dong in Seoul. It's a complex cultural space with Korea's biggest multiplex Megabox theater, themed aquarium, shopping, restaurants, and entertainments.

content.sgt: Have a look at the Korea's biggest building. It's like the Tower of Sauron in Lord of the Rings.
content.formal: The highest building in Korea, which is located in Jamsil, Seoul.

content.sgt: Soliders like roller coaster too! HoOaH!
content.formal: Theme park rides, water flumes & marine life exhibits in a family centred 3-in-1 adventure park.

content.sgt: It's not bad enjoying a glass of beer neer the lake after having a drastic ride.
content.formal: A lake located in Songpa-gu, Seoul, next to Lotte World Mall. It's composed of two lakes on the basis of the bridge, and it's very popular among the young and old by creating a beautiful atmosphere in the theme park Lotte World.

content.sgt: This place was once crowded by the world because of the Olympics in 1988. I was a PFC at that time...
content.formal: Site of Seoul 1988 Olympics with a square mile of green space, sculptures & sports venues. A comprehensive park built for the 1988 Seoul Olympics. It is well known for its spacious and amusing parks and is also home to Mongchon Saturn, a Baekje site.

editorChoice.description: You can see the lake and enjoy shopping while taking a roller coaster ride! How perfect is that!

editorChoice.name: City of Literature and Night Life

content.sgt: Publishing? Books? You may think I'm joking right now, but this place is famous for its wonderful architecture rather than books, so do not worry.
content.formal: In Paju Publishing City, like its name, it covers all aspects of publishing, from planning and editing, printing, logistics and distribution. In 1989, publishers who dreamed of modernizing their publishing structure began to gather together, As the buildings that preceded the times were added, they became a complex cultural space.

content.sgt: Books and the fish have a lot in common ... Hope y'all know about it too.
content.formal: An aquarium featuring diverse marine life, animal feedings & artistic diving shows. It's an aquarium located in Ilsan. Underwater tunnels, large glass walls, and many other kinds of aquatic life. It's a complex cultural space with Korea's biggest multiplex Megabox theater, themed aquarium, shopping, restaurants, and entertainments.

content.sgt: Books and fish. What could be the next? Eat and drink!
content.formal: Street of youth located in Ilsan. It's good to walk around as there's Ilsan Lake Park nearby.

content.sgt: Did not you notice when you were enjoying in Lapesta? There's a beautiful lake right next to it.
content.formal: Lake Park located in Ilsan. It's famous for its largest artificial lake park in the Orient.

editorChoice.description: Do you like books? Have you ever seen a city about books? Enjoy reading with wonderful modern architecture. If you like books, you'll surely like the aquarium too. Don't worry. There is also a place for parties in the evening.

editorChoice.name: Coastal Bike Ride along East Coast

content.sgt: This trip starts with a very small town, and it will be a pretty old and shabby Assembly point.
content.formal: This trip starts with a small town. So this old and shabby express bus terminal is the starting point of the trip.

content.sgt: We can see our enemy North Korean territory inside the DMZ. Don't worry, it's far longer than the sniper range.
content.formal: Observatory offering South Korea's closest views of North Korea & monuments promoting unification. An observation deck with a view of North Korea located inside the DMZ. In order to enter here, you need to be pre-educated at the entrance.

content.sgt: It's the first checkpoint you'll have to ride a bike.
content.formal: A railroad bridge. If you pass through this area, you'll get out of the small town 'Goseong'.

content.sgt: It would not be too bad for people to rest in this pavillon for a while before entering a bustling marketplace.
content.formal: A pavillon located on a rock on the beach. Beautiful scenery and wonderful sound waves.

content.sgt: Did you know? There's a beautiful beach right next to you.
content.formal: A beautiful beach of East Sea.

content.sgt: This beach seems a bit different than others.
content.formal: There are lots of tourists to look at this emerald beach.

content.sgt: There were lots of big events in this small train station, once the North Korean spies came in and there was a disturbance.
content.formal: A historic small train station located at the old eastern end. There have been encounters with North Korean spies here.

content.sgt: After passing Jeongdongjin station, you can see the beach where more and more people come.  I'm sure you have your swiming suits with you.
content.formal: East beach where lots of people come by.

content.sgt: If you are in this port, you can hear seagulls and see various sceneries.
content.formal: A harbor located on the beach of the East Sea. You can enjoy various scenery.

places.name: Mukho Harbor Live Fish Market Center

content.sgt: Like fish? It's my frist time seeing so much fresh seafood.
content.formal: If you like seafood, you can enjoy a variety of seafood and pick your own.

content.sgt: It's amazing that there are rocks in various shapes. Very interesting.
content.formal: A beach where large and small rock islands are located and various spectacular views can be seen.

content.sgt: Do you have matches with you? Wait, that's not a candle.
content.formal: Candle rock located at the beach is named after its shape resemblinng a candle.

content.sgt: I thought it was a pretty convenience store because the cave is located in the village.
content.formal: Naturally made caves. It's located in the unique downtown of Korea, so it's convenient to access.

content.sgt: You can go to barrack again after you get here. Do not be late for PT session tomorrow morning ...
content.formal: A station to send you back to the unit.

editorChoice.description: Don't you want to see the sea while riding a bike? It's not quite humane when you're stuck in the unit. Why not go for a nice trip?

editorChoice.name: District of Young & Free

content.sgt: At this Assembly Point, I can feel youth
content.formal: A subway station in Shinchon-dong, Seodaemun-gu, Seoul.

content.sgt: It's a shopping mall in the campus area with a lot of young students, so it's going to be trend-setting too.
content.formal: It's located near Hongdae, Korea's representative youthful street, and its famous colleges such as Yonsei University, Sogang University and Ewha Womans University are forming a university town.

content.sgt: You shouldn't be surprised by the young students gathered near Shinchon station.
content.formal: A subway station in Mapo-gu, Seoul, Line 2, Kyunghee Joongang Line and Airport Railroad pass by.

content.sgt: World travelers and a lot of young people are walking here. Don't you smlle beer nearby?
content.formal: t's Korea's representative youth street. It's also home to musicians and is famous for bars, fashion, restaurants and clubs.

content.sgt: You know K-pop, right? This is a hiphop club runned by one of those famous entertainment agencies. I know some hiphop too.
content.formal: A representative hiphop club in Hongdae runned by Korea's biggest K-pop agency, YG.

content.sgt: I know some of you aren't interested in hiphop. Then why don't you check this place out?
content.formal: Hongdae's representative club, famous for its unique sound.

editorChoice.description: A place where sun doesn't set for 24 hours. A place where lots of young people come to streets and enjoy parties. It's a place you must go when you came to Korea.

editorChoice.name: Downtown in Area 4

content.sgt: This is the assembly point of the trip and it would be easy for the people in Area4 to visit.
content.formal: Along with Dongdaegu Station, it's the main railway station of Daegu Metropolitan City. KTX doesn't stop, but it's located in the city center.

content.sgt: Bulgogi. Have you heard of it? Even though you haven't have it a try. I take some on my way home on vacation.
content.formal: It is one of the taste alleys located in Bucheon-ro in Daegu. Briquettes can be found at affordable prices.

content.sgt: Where are all these people coming from?
content.formal: Most crowded street in Daegu. It's nice to enjoy shopping, restaurant, cafe, bar, club, etc.

content.sgt: This should an assembly point for the soldiers in Area 4. Shall we have some fun?
content.formal: It's one of the most popular clubs in Daegu. It mainly turns on hiphop music.

editorChoice.description: Don't be too depressed that you're too far away from Seoul. In Area 4, there's "Daegu" where it's full of joy. Joy lasts for 24 hours and you can also enjoy delicious food.

editorChoice.name: Fun in Rivers and Mountains

content.sgt: You have your swiming suit, right?
content.formal: ITX Gyeongchun Line, located in Cheongpyeong-myeon, Gapyeong-gun, Gyeonggi Province.

content.sgt: Don't you want to jump right into the water? This is the right place for it.
content.formal: A pension where you can enjoy water leisures.

content.sgt: If you walk on the river, you will find an island called Wang Island. I remember riding a bike with my beloved wife.
content.formal: Picturesque eco-tourist island featuring galleries, a museum, stages & festivals in lush surrounds. It's an island not far from Seoul. You'll feel like going on a long trip because you have to get there by taking a boat. There are various forests and trails all around the island, and there are many cute things to see and it's popular among lovers.

content.sgt: Have you ever ridden a bicycle running on a train track?
content.formal: From Gapyeong station to Gyeonggang station, you can follow the 8km round-trip course and enjoy the scenery along the rails.

content.sgt: Excited for the morning PT tomorrow?
content.formal: It's a train station of Gyeongchun line, located in Gapyeong-gun, Gyeonggi-do. It's either called Jara Island station or Nami Island station after the famous tourist site, Nami Island which is well-known for its Jazz Festival.

editorChoice.description: If you don't have enough time to get to the sea but can enjoy marine leisure sports in a lake near Seoul, how good is that? So I prepared it for you.

editorChoice.name: History and View of Southern Seaside

content.sgt: This is the assembly point.
content.formal: It's a express bus terminal located in Gyeongsangnam-do Tongyeong.

content.sgt: You've heard of Admiral Yi? He deserves respect from all the soldiers.
content.formal: Waterfront parkland with an observation deck & cultural center, plus a statue of a revered general.

content.sgt: You should be excited to see the world's famous sculptors having gathered to present their works.
content.formal: It's a sculpture park built in 1997 with 15 works by famous sculptors from 10 countries. It has a 1650 m^2 site and is displays a unique work world in the background of beautiful natural scenery.

content.sgt: It's the first undersea tunnel in Asia, let's take a walk.
content.formal: It's the first undersea tunnel of Dongyang built to connect Tongyeong and Mireukdo. It's designed to walk.

content.sgt: Luge! Go for a race and see the scenery too! I'm ready!
content.formal: You can enjoy the Tongyeong scenery by riding down the luge, a portable three-wheeled riding machine.

editorChoice.description: What would it feel like to be at the southest end of Korea? How fun would it be to have a Go-Karts ride from the top of a hill where you can see the sea?

editorChoice.name: it's always sunny in Gangnam

content.sgt: Fine Chinese food in Korea.. hmm.. It's quite different from that in Red Dragon in my town.
content.formal: Fine Chinese restaurant located in Cheongdam-dong, Seoul.

content.sgt: Will you show me your wallet?... You're thinking of going to the Galleria Department Store with only that? You should just enjoy it with your eyes.
content.formal: A department store of Hanhwa Group in Apgujeong-dong, Gangnam-gu, Seoul. It's located in Apgujeong, a typical downtown area, and has many luxurious lines.

content.sgt: The street where artists are gathered is always right.
content.formal: Established venue lined with high-end stores, cafes & people-watching opportunities. The boulevard in Sinsa-dong, Seoul is famous for the street formed by artists. Fashion, restaurants, cafes, etc. are crowded to create an exotic atmosphere and it's one of the popular places among young people.

content.sgt: When you get back by the bus, it would not be too bad to take a break from here.
content.formal: It's a comprehensive restaurant located in Seoul Express Bus Terminal. You can taste various foods with carefully selected restaurants. It's a good place to stop by before returining to the unit or for a meal.

content.sgt: Are any of you from France? Oh, right, we're US Army, Bonjour Hooah!
content.formal: It is located in Seocho-gu, Seoul, well-known as 'French Town'. It's the place where about half of French people living in Korea reside. French restaurants, cafes and bakeries are famous.

content.sgt: It's where the French people lived, so there should be a French-inspired park.
content.formal: It's a French-themed park located in Seorae Village. It's not big, but it's quiet and is good to take a walk.

editorChoice.description: Do you want to enjoy daily life like the locals in the downtown of Seoul? Have some sightseeing of the streets and delicious meal with some coffee.

editorChoice.name: Korea's Florida

content.sgt: Finally Busan! Let's all get ready!
content.formal: It's located in the east of Busan's representative train station. It's located 441.7km from Seoul station. Haeundae, the representative beach, is located 20.7km from the station.

content.sgt: When the artists and a town of small houses meet, a new neighborhood is born.
content.formal: Picturesque attraction featuring a village of colorful houses, painted murals, shops & cafes.

content.sgt: Do you like movies? This may be Hollywood in Korea.
content.formal: It's a street where you can meet Busan International Film Festival. It's a place similar to Hollywood street where you can meet hand printings and various events of famous movie-makers.

content.sgt: Busan's traditional market, there are many seafood, Orca-Hooah!
content.formal: World famous market for fresh fish & seafood to take away or eat at the informal stalls.

content.sgt: When I look at the sea from the southeast end of Korea, my house and my family come to mind.
content.formal: Clifftop park area featuring an observatory with water views, plus a train ride, lighthouse & more.

content.sgt: It's been a long time since many young people gathered in this wonderful sea to enjoy their leisure time.
content.formal: It's the most famous coast along with Haeundae. It's considered to be the most beautiful beach in Busan due to the night view of Gwangan Bridge in the sandy beach. Street performances are also frequent and it's one of the best places to enjoy Busan's night sea.

content.sgt: It feels like you're surrounded by skyscrapers inside the fort.
content.formal: It's considered as one of the representative night scenery attractions in Busan. It's located near the marine city, where the sea and skyscrapers meet to create a beautiful night view. It's no better to enjoy the delicious food and enjoy the youth with the night view of the modern feeling of sea and high-rise building.

content.sgt: It's the representative beach in Korea. Get your swmming suit out.
content.formal: Expansive beach with lively crowds & convenient access to a variety of hotels, cafes & restaurants.

content.sgt: This place is like a small San Franciso.
content.formal: A place where you can walk the railroad tracks while watching the offshore of Busan Haeundae. It's often used as a filming spot.

content.sgt: Does any of you have interest in  Buddhism? Even though you don't go make a visit. It's a famous temple built in the 14th century.
content.formal: Enduring Buddhist temple constructed in the 14th-century & offering sweeping views of the sea.

content.sgt: It once got to Guinness as the largest department store in the world. Don't be too surprised.
content.formal: It's a department store located in Centum City, Busan. It's famous as the largest department store in the world and also got into the Guinness Book of World Records. It touches the sea and boasts a grand, clean interior.

editorChoice.description: Korea's Florida. Men and women of alla ges are enjoying their time at the beach. It couldn't be any better for soldiers when you're enjoying free time in restaurants and cafes.

editorChoice.name: Korea's Hawaii

content.sgt: As I said, Jejudo is an island! A plance will be faster to get there than by a ship!
content.formal: Jeju Island airport offering flights to domestic destinations & cities in China, Japan & Taiwan. Move to Gimpo International Airport first to go to Jeju Internatioal Airport (It takes about 1h 10min for the flight)

content.sgt: Don't think about walking around because it's an island. Try getting a car to pick you up here.
content.formal: Although Jeju Island is an island, it's a little big for walking, so if you go to a rental car area located at the airport and rent a car, your trip will be a little easier.

content.sgt: So you came to the island and where are you going to stay?
content.formal: Tranquil island hotel with straightforward suites, plus a restaurant, a bar & a spa.

content.sgt: Do you like noodles? I do to.
content.formal: It's a steet where you can meet various noodles of Jeju Island from meat noodles to sashimi noodles.

content.sgt: It reminds me of the past as I get into this large forest.
content.formal: Tranquil path through cedar forest popular for quiet walks, wildlife viewing & photography.

content.sgt: It's dreamy, this forest.
content.formal: This natural monument consists of thousands of nutmeg trees ranging from 500 to 800 years old.

content.sgt: Volcano phobia, anyone?
content.formal: A dormant volcanic crater towering between the blue waters is called Seongsan because it looks like a huge castle. The sunrise is famous, and it's called 'Ilchoongbong', and the green lawn is made.

content.sgt: I feel like singing an army song on this hill.
content.formal: Quiet, seafront beach area offering a lighthouse, restaurants & shops, plus scenic views & trails.'Seobjicoji' means the terrain that protrudes into the sea, in Jeju dialect. It's also the most popular place for movies and dramas because of the outstanding scenery that creates harmony between hills and blue sea.

content.sgt: This place is famous for citrus. I'll have to buy some and eat it in barracks.
content.formal: Seogwipo Olle Market is a traditional market located in Seogwipo City, called Seoul of Jeju Island. It's part of the Jeju Olle Gil course and offers a variety of cultural events and festivals. Local specialties such as citrus fruits, halobongs, and pomegranates are mainly sold.

content.sgt: This is where a naval base where our friends are is located.
content.formal: The location of Jeju Seonjeongji is where you can feel the peaceful and quiet atmosphere of Jeju Island.

content.sgt: They say it's the biggest mountain in Korea! You have your camel bag with you, right?
content.formal: Lava was formed as a dormant volcano in the center of Jeju Island. The climbing route to the top of the mountain, Baeklokdam, makes it famous for its beautiful scenery.

content.sgt: Emerald color of this beach is beautiful.
content.formal: Beach known for fine sand & clear, shallow waters, with a snack bar, showers & changing rooms. It's a beach where you can enjoy the beautiful emerald sea water and tropics located in the west side of Jeju Island.

editorChoice.description: Going to Hawaii isn't also easy to go from your hometown. But Korea's Hawaii ins't that far away in Korea. Feel the palmtrees which you can't see in the unit and the splendid atmosphere of the huge island.

editorChoice.name: Korea's Manhattan

content.sgt: It was once the tallest building, and it looks beautiful in the middle of Seoul.
content.formal: Ultramodern 63-story tower with an IMAX cinema, a marine park & a sky deck with city views. It's Korea's representative landmark building. It's made up of 63 floors and that is why it's called '63 Building'. The exterior of the building, painted in gold, is famous for its beautiful scenery with the Han River. You can also visit various facilities such as observation decks and aquariums.

content.sgt: Why do you bother going to the sea when there is a wonderful river like this.
content.formal: Large, popular park on the river featuring scenic views, plus running paths & a swimming pool. One of the most representative Han River parks in Korea. It has a large site along the Han River, and you can hire bicycles to follow the Han River. A great place to sit and enjoy the chicken and beer with river winds.

content.sgt: Didnt' expect that there would be Han River park in this small island, and this park too.
content.formal: It's a representative urban center park directly following Yeouido Han River Park. It's also the center of Yeouido. It's good to take a walk and enjoy the feeling like the central park of Korea.

content.sgt: As the Manhattan of Seoul, there are many fancy buildings, corporate streets, and complex cultural spaces.
content.formal: It's a representative indoor shopping center of Korea which has a wide range of entertainment such as luxury brands, casual brands, movie theaters and restaurants. It boasts a magnificent and clean exterior, and it's a better place to relax in indoors when you want to have a break after walking around Yeouido.

content.sgt: I've never seen such a wonderful and magnificent hotel. Wish army lodge has such interior designs like this.
content.formal: It's the representative hotel of Yeouido which is selected as one of 'Best New Hotel' of Conde Nast Traveler. It's locaetd near the IFC Mall and has excellent accessibility to Yeouido Park and Yeouido Han River Park.

editorChoice.description: Don't you want to know how Korea's Wall Street is? There's also a business district in an island in the middle of Seoul. Enjoy the view of Korea's Manhattan.

editorChoice.name: Korea's New Capital City

content.sgt: You've finally made to Korea's new capital!
content.formal: Express bus terminal located in Galmae-ro, Sejong City.

content.sgt: Take a look at the new city that's just being developped from here.
content.formal: It's an observatory located in Eojing-dong, Sejong City, and you can see the city.

content.sgt: Such lake in the middle of a city makes me want to live here.
content.formal: It's a lake park in the center of Sejong City. There are five theme parks around the lake.

content.sgt: It's a small place, but it's enough to see the old Korean architecture.
content.formal: It's a Buddhist temple in the Joseon Dynasty, located in Seong-dong in Sejong City. Although it's small in size, but you can overlook the style of Joseon Dynasty and Sejong City.

content.sgt: Hope you have camping equipments with you. Hey you, private! Why did you bring a A-Frame tent when there's a trailor they offer?
content.formal: A trailer camping site located in Hapgang Park in Sejong City.

content.sgt: Are you interested in space? I'm going to apply to NASA after my ETS.
content.formal: It's a research institute for space research operated by Korea Geographic Information Service.

editorChoice.description: Actually, it's not the capital any more. Recently, it was moved to a new city. Let's go to the new administrative capital of Korea, which has not been visited by local people yet.

editorChoice.name: Korea's Seattle

content.sgt: It's a great place for an assembly point.
content.formal: It's a park located in the central part of Incheon Songdo International City. The surrounding scenery and park are beautifully constructed and popular.

content.sgt: Since Incheon is located at the west end, its history with China has been deep.
content.formal: City Historical Museum in Incheon. I can see and feel the development process of Incheon, the current state, and the vision of the future naturally.

content.sgt: What are these huge bowls? Are these for giants?
content.formal: Local landmark hosting a regular line-up varied exhibitions, conferences & performances. It's a multi cultural complex known for its unique design that combines 3 bowls. It's famous for its beautiful night view.

content.sgt: It's not bad to have a meal looking at an international city from a high view. Hope you are not afraid of height.
content.formal: It's a tower located inside Songdo Central Park. For the first time in Asia, GCF (Green Climate Fund) and various international organizations related to environmental protection are living among the headquarters of UN international organizations.

content.sgt: Must be a good experience to stay here for a night.
content.formal: Hotel built with Korean traditional style that's surrounded by skyscrapers.

content.sgt: There must be China on the other side.
content.formal: The Incheon Grand Bridge Observatory is a good place to enjoy the beautiful sunset of Incheon Bridge.

content.sgt: If you're wandering around in Korea and get hungry, Korean BBQ is the one for you!
content.formal: It's one of the most famous Korean beef restaurants in Songdo.

editorChoice.description: Strange buildings. High towers. And the huge parks, relaxed people and the western sea. Could it be Seattle of South Korea?

editorChoice.name: Korea's Silicon Valley

content.sgt: Don't judge me. I actually have interests in small and cute cafes.
content.formal: It's a street with different cafes located in Jeongja-dong, Bundang area.

content.sgt: This is the Silicon Valley in Korea.
content.formal: It's a high-tech industrial research complex located in Bundang-gu, Seongnam City, Gyeonggi-do.

content.sgt: Enjoy some space here surrounded by mountains and buildings.
content.formal: It's a park located in Bundang-gu, Seongnam City, Gyeonggi-do. You can enjoy the park along the small cloth and it's good for a walk.

content.sgt: It's the largest department store in Korea. This probably is the time to bring back to when I took the Land Navigation test.
content.formal: Bundang Hyundai department store, Korea's largest department store and mall. You can enjoy various kinds of shopping from luxury.

editorChoice.description: There's a Silicon Vallery in Korea too. Many IT companies and start-ups. It's not bad to feel their passion.

editorChoice.name: Little Europe in Korea

content.sgt: Better remember this place. This is our assembly point.
content.formal: An express bus terminal arriving to Damyang.

content.sgt: Bamboo here, bamboo there, and there goes another bamboo! I feel like I'm in an oriental action movie.
content.formal: Large, serene bamboo garden with massive plants, lights for night walks & nearby amenities. A bamboo forest that retains its natural beauty of the Orient. You can feel the grandeur of nature among the huge bamboo trees.

content.sgt: Can't believe there is another beautiful forest right next to the bamboo forest?
content.formal: If Juknokwon was oriental, the Metasequoia Road is a beautiful nature surrounded by metasequoia trees.

content.sgt: This place gives me a feeling like I'm in Europe for a second.
content.formal: It's a town and park built on European architecture. There are various sights and places to relax.

editorChoice.description: Why not a bamboo forest than an ordinary one? Oriental forest isn't that bad.

editorChoice.name: Many Worlds in One

content.sgt: There are a lot of Korean high-class people living here. There are also many embassies here.
content.formal: It's located in Yongsan-gu, Seoul and is right next to Itaewon. Representative villages of Korea and embassies are located. A lot of foreigners live here and it gives an exotic feeling.

content.sgt: So many embassies! Wonder how many countries are out there!
content.formal: A street where many embassies are located along Hannam-dong.

content.sgt: It's not a bad idea to have some rest in a cafe after a walk.
content.formal: A typical cafe located in Hannam-dong. A small jazz performance is also done on Friday evenings.

content.sgt: Let's try Korean steak enjoyed by the elites. Oh shxx..! I didn't bring my wallet..
content.formal: A luxurious steak house known for its Korean beef menu in Hannam-dong.

content.sgt: Finally, Itaewon! Take a cup of coffee to refresh yourself.
content.formal: A typical cafe in Itaewon. The gardens are well laid out and celebrities frequently visit this place.

content.sgt: There are a variety of people in Korea, too many places to stay ...
content.formal: It's the most exotic place in Seoul, where many foreigners live and create diverse cultural atmosphere. It's famous for restaurants, clubs, and USAG Yongsan.

content.sgt: It's probably good to end a day with having a drink in the cozy hotel lounge.
content.formal: Posh lodging offering refined rooms & suites, plus international cuisine, 4 bars & a fitness center. It's a first class resort hotel located in the center of Seoul, Namsan.

editorChoice.description: People gathered from all over the world drinks and have conversation at this place. How exciting is that? The world sure is small.

editorChoice.name: Party Place for Area 3

content.sgt: It's an assembly point, so keep it in mind.
content.formal: A subway station located in Suwon, Gyeonggi-do. Line 1, Bundang line and Gyeongbu line pass by.

content.sgt: Quite big department store, heh? Seems like everyone's gonna gather around this place.
content.formal: A department store located in Suwon City, Gyeonggi-do.

content.sgt: Whenever I think of delicious chicken, I always come visit here.
content.formal: District with various chicken restaurants that is long loved by Korean nationals.

content.sgt: Forgot to tell you that you shouldn't eat too much chicken. I'll have Korean BBQ in your place.
content.formal: One of the popular Korean BBQ restaurant in Suwon.

content.sgt: You should dance as much as you ate!
content.formal: The most popular EDM club in Sunwon located in Ingyae-dong.

editorChoice.description: Do you think Seoul is a bit far from Pyeongtaek? Then there's an exciting city nearby! Suwon is famous for Korean style barbeque!

editorChoice.name: Riverside Camping

content.sgt: Let's have some fun at the outdoor swimming pool next to Han River.
content.formal: An outdoor swimming pool located at Ttukseom Amusement Park, Seoul's most famous Hangang Park.

content.sgt: It's not it your first time camping in the city, right? Get your beer quickly.
content.formal: It's a camping ground located right next to Han River. Camping and barbecue in Han River that flows in the center of Seoul. They also have a tent ready for you to stay for a night.

places.name: World Cup Park Outdoor Skate Park/Ice Rink

content.sgt: The 2002 World Cup sure did bring the hearts of Koreans together, and now the skateboarders are here.
content.formal: Ice rink (for winter) / Skate park (for summer) at the Sangam Stadium, the main stadium of the 2002 Korea-Japan World Cup.

editorChoice.description: How much fun would it be if you get to camp near the huge river in downtown? So I prepared it for you.

editorChoice.name: To the Farthest East

content.sgt: This time's assembly point is just an ordinary bus station.
content.formal: An express bus terminal located in Hongjae-dong, Gangneung, Gangwon-do.

content.sgt: This village has been fishing since the old days, and it smells like fish obviously. Too bad, if you have a sea sickness.
content.formal: It's a port in Songjeong-dong, Gangneung, Gangwon-do. You can meet several sea food restaurants along the sea.

content.sgt: Finally we are here at the island in the far east end.
content.formal: It's a port located in Ulleung-gun, Gyeongsandbuk-do. It's Ulleung's biggest port.

content.sgt: Can't believe there's a village within this small island.
content.formal: It's the most representative port of Ulleung-do. You can meet a charming village and sashimi restaurants.

editorChoice.description: You know that Korea is located in the very east, right? How about going to the island at the far east end? People do live on that little island! This place may not be able to communicate linguistically such as reserving a flight, so be sure to go with a KATUSA friend.

editorChoice.name: Tracing the Dynasty

content.sgt: When we were fighting against Japan, this land was occupied by Japan, and thanks to Kim Gu, we could be deployed to Korea.
content.formal: A museum that was established to succeed and celebrate the achievements of Professor Kim, who was the greatest contributor to the independence of Korea. You can see the history of Korean independence.

content.sgt: Hey, no eye-ballings! This place is not just a women's university.
content.formal: Seoul's first private women's university found with the significance of rights to study for women.

content.sgt: Since the Republic of Korea exists today, the independence sentence exists as well.
content.formal: It's a monument symbolizing the modernization of the Republic of Korea. The park spreads beautifully around the gate.

content.sgt: It's one of the royal palaces of Joseon Dynasty, the former kingdom of Korea. Its atmosphere changes according to the season, so you should come at least 4 times a year.
content.formal: Palace orginally built in the 17th century by the Joseon dynasty, with an adjacent history museum. Due to its small size among the five palaces of the Joseon Dynasty, it's less popular as a sightseeing spot, but it has a tragic history and is famous for the scenery that changes according to the season.

content.sgt: During the Joseon Dynasty, the ancesteral rite was important, and the ancestors have also once held ancestral rites at this park.
content.formal: A park where people of the Joseon Dynasty held traditional rites for the god of the land and the god of the grain.

content.sgt: It's a palace where the King of Joseon lived and is still well preserved. Seeing how well preserved it is, I feel like I'm gone back to that period.
content.formal: Free guided tours are offered at this large, 14th-century royal palace with a museum & gardens. It's the most representative palace among the five palaces of Joseon located in Seoul. It's famous for its magnificent scale, the most traditional building style, and the panoramic view with Gwanghwamun Square. It's located near Insa-dong and Korea's representative and traditional places, and also holds various events such as the substitution of the gate keepers.

places.name: National Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art

content.sgt: Korea is also open to art and design. You should see their wonderful works of art.
content.formal: Korean contemporary & modern art exhibited in a number of indoor galleries & outdoor courtyards. A representative Korean art museum famous for its architecture located in a place where past and present coexist.

content.sgt: There are modern shops in old traditional buildings.
content.formal: It's located next to Gyeongbokgung Palace and is famous for where the traditional and modern streets meet. It offers an extraordinary experience as well as traditional foods as well as modern food. Bukchon is connected to Hanok Village.

editorChoice.description: The reason why Korea could have existed so far is thanks to the Joseon Dynasty. There are many places in Seoul where their kings and royal families have stayed. Feel the history of Korea.

editorChoice.name: Urban Enough, Nature Enough

content.sgt: The first floor of this department will be our assembly point.
content.formal: It's a department store located in Seohyun station in Bundang.

content.sgt: Love hiking? Then you should go to the nearest mountain from the city. If you don't, just skip this part.
content.formal: It's a moutain located near the border of the of Seocho-gu in Seoul, Gwacheon in Gyeonggi-do, Euiwang City, and Seongnam City. There are well-made hiking trails, and there are many popular restaurants at the entrance of the mountain.

content.sgt: If you're interested in plants, I recommend you this place.
content.formal: A botanical garden located in Seongnam City and is operated by Shingu University.

content.sgt: I feel like reciting a poem after having a walk in a traditional park.
content.formal: Large, tree-filled park offering a bicycle trail, badminton courts & an outdoor theater with events. A city park in the center of Bundang city with small lakes and paths along the perimeter. Pavillons built in traditional Korean style are located in a good place.

content.sgt: Airborne anyone? Let's prepare for it by jumping off from a bungee jump.
content.formal: Park located in Bundang. There are many Korean BBQ places near the lake. If you go with your friends, try the bungee jump here.

content.sgt: One of Korea's largest department store. You should remember your Land Navigation test.
content.formal: Bundang Hyundai department store, the Korea's largest department store as well as mall. You can enjoy a variety of shopping from luxury goods.

editorChoice.description: Do you like hiking? But if you don't like going too far away, it's not bad going to the one next to the downtown. It cannot be any better to have a cup of coffee after a long hike.

editorChoice.name: Valley Caravan

content.sgt: From the past, the caravans prepared food for before they left. So grab some if you don't want to get hungry.
content.formal: You'll need food and supplies for this trip. So, prepare youself first from here and then depart along the valley.

content.sgt: Let's enjoy the rest in this valley that isn't too deep nor crowded.
content.formal: Take a moment to get out of the city and pitch the tent in the mountain valley. Enjoy camping whith food, friends, and beer. What a touching moment.

content.sgt: Korea has a deep relationship with Mongolia. Let's experience the culture of Mongolians who have once ruled the entire world.
content.formal: A little further up the valley is Mongolian town, where you can see and experience old Mongolian traditions and horseback riding techniques. It's a place where you can compete with your friends for horseback riding.

editorChoice.description: There's a place where the tradition of old Mongolians are preserved. There's even a riverside where you can go camping to get there. It seems as if we've became caravans.

editorChoice.name: West Side Story

content.sgt: Are you excited to have some fun in the new city?
content.formal: A new city station consisted of parks and new buildings.

content.sgt: Have some beer and have a look at those excited people. We can be like them!
content.formal: An area with full of excitement. A place where people drinks and chills.

content.sgt: Do you know where OT Genesis sang his song called Coco? He actually performed at this place!
content.formal: A club where various hiphop artists like OT Genesis and others have visited.

content.sgt: Shall we have some sleep in this island?
content.formal: A clean and mid-sized hotel located in the island.

content.sgt: Have you tried roller coaster in this island?
content.formal: Popular destination offering rides & an indoor playground for kids, including water activities. Thought it's not big nor quite clean, you can try fun and unique rides.

content.sgt: Since this place has deep exchanges with China, there should be a China town too. Say Nihao to everyone!
content.formal: Bustling tourist & district known for its Chinese-owned restaurants & businesses. The largest China town in Korea. Chinese natives what haven't forgotten their tradition live here.

content.sgt: Jjajangmyeon. I couldn't forget this taste, and that's why I'm still in Korea.
content.formal: An original museum where you can experience the history and the variety of jjajangmyeon.

content.sgt: You should take a walk around the Incheon traditional market. There are lots to see.
content.formal: A traditional market in the west where it sells a variety of foods.

content.sgt: Get here in order to get back to the barracks.
content.formal: A station which will send you back to your lovely unit.

editorChoice.description: How was the West back in the States? West of Korea is quite different, too. There is a huge Chinatown and community with the long relationship with China. So there are markets and people with a mix of Korean and Chinese culture.
